name: UFO and harvest
description:
This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52
THEME - Harvest

You play as UFO in a far galaxy 
Your goal is to reach your love.

CONTROLS:

F to Fullscreen

R to restart 

A to move counter clockwise 

D to move clockwise

W to fly 

S to open shop(only on the moons with flags)

W to close shop if open

Space to take harvest

MMB move camera
RMB move camera back to UFO
